review:
I am under treatment of Dr. Subhash Chandra since 2004 when he was in Narinder Mohan Hospital. His service with smile is beyond comparison.  Whenever I visit for any consultation or treatment, he advises me like family members I don't believe any other Doctor.
 I have  also recommended his name to friends in  case of any problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Excellent experience , even on Sunday being holiday I was treated by him directly .
I recommend to use his experience by person needing cardiology issue
